about_the_game:
Bodybuilder Simulator CO-OP – Your Path to the Top

This game is an advanced fitness simulator with a co-op mode, allowing you to play with up to 4 friends. Work together to achieve your goals or compete to see who comes out on top – the choice is yours!

Create your character using a detailed character creator where you can adjust body fat and muscle levels to closely match your own appearance. Additionally, the game lets you upload a photo of your face to make your character even more personal and lifelike. To add variety, you can also randomize genetic predispositions for developing different muscle groups, making your character truly unique.

A realistic anatomical system accurately simulates muscle and tendon movements, ensuring every workout looks and feels natural. Your character will dynamically respond to your decisions, diet, and training. Train properly, and you’ll be rewarded with the perfect physique. However, neglect your training or focus on unbalanced muscle development, and you’ll quickly notice the effects – not just in appearance but also in your character’s proportions and overall aesthetics.

Don’t forget about your character’s mental state, which also impacts workout efficiency.

The game features a photo mode, allowing you to capture and share pictures of your character’s progress with friends.

In addition to gym workouts and competing on the fitness stage, you can try your hand at other activities, such as martial arts, billiards, or darts.

Earn money through memberships, conduct personal training sessions, keep your gym in order, expand it by purchasing new equipment, and build your fitness empire. Become the king of the fitness world!
detailed_description:
Bodybuilder Simulator CO-OP – Your Path to the Top

This game is an advanced fitness simulator with a co-op mode, allowing you to play with up to 4 friends. Work together to achieve your goals or compete to see who comes out on top – the choice is yours!

Create your character using a detailed character creator where you can adjust body fat and muscle levels to closely match your own appearance. Additionally, the game lets you upload a photo of your face to make your character even more personal and lifelike. To add variety, you can also randomize genetic predispositions for developing different muscle groups, making your character truly unique.

A realistic anatomical system accurately simulates muscle and tendon movements, ensuring every workout looks and feels natural. Your character will dynamically respond to your decisions, diet, and training. Train properly, and you’ll be rewarded with the perfect physique. However, neglect your training or focus on unbalanced muscle development, and you’ll quickly notice the effects – not just in appearance but also in your character’s proportions and overall aesthetics.

Don’t forget about your character’s mental state, which also impacts workout efficiency.

The game features a photo mode, allowing you to capture and share pictures of your character’s progress with friends.

In addition to gym workouts and competing on the fitness stage, you can try your hand at other activities, such as martial arts, billiards, or darts.

Earn money through memberships, conduct personal training sessions, keep your gym in order, expand it by purchasing new equipment, and build your fitness empire. Become the king of the fitness world!
name: Bodybuilder Simulator CO-OP

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows(64-bit) 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4690 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 960 2GB
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows(64-bit) 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6600K / AMD Ryzen 7 1700X
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 1080 8GB
  • Storage: 40 GB available space

short_description: Our game is a realistic fitness simulator with a co-op mode. Collect trophies, earn money, and shape your physique! Your character dynamically reacts to diet and training, reflecting real physical changes. Take on the challenge with friends and strive for peak fitness!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Simplified Chinese, Greek, Japanese, Polish*, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Romanian, Turkish, Hungarian, Finnish, Korean, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
